div.head: 丹石衝眼
div.div: cinnabar [et al.] mineral [poison] rushes against the eyes

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: cinnabar [et al.] mineral [poison] rushes against the eyes

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a dan shi du fa 丹石毒發 , outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral poisoning, with red, swollen and aching eyes. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bian xu 萹蓄 quoting Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 : 丹石發，衝眼目腫痛 , “In case of an outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral [poisoning, the poison] rushes against the eyes and causes them to swell and be painful”, writes: 丹石衝眼 , “ Cinnabar [et al.] mineral [poison] rushes against the eyes ”.
